name: Alexandros Labrinidis
content: Alexandros Labrinidis | Professor of Computer Science, University of Pittsburgh Skip to primary content Latest News Recognized as an IEEE Computer Society Distinguished ContributorFebruary 28, 2023 New website up and runningJanuary 11, 2023 Our Big Data paper surpasses 25,000 downloadsJanuary 3, 2023 Teaching Introduction to Data Science in the Spring 2023 termDecember 22, 2022 ADMT Lab Research Internships (Spring 2023)December 21, 2022 [ All news ] #Introduction PROFESSOR Department of Computer Science, School of Computing and Information, University of Pittsburgh Co-Director Advanced Data Management Technologies Laboratory (ADMT Lab), University of Pittsburgh Adjunct PROFESSOR Department of Computer Science,School of Computer Science, Carnegie Mellon University Research Interests Databases, Data Management,Data Science Teaching CS 1656 / CS 2056: Introduction to Data Science(Spring 2023) Projects PittSmartLiving (PI) Education Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of Maryland BSc and MSc in Computer Science from the University of Crete Misc Pronouns: he, his, him Name in Greek: Αλέξανδρος Λαμπρινίδης
